definitions.definition: Otherwise ; at another time; in other circumstances ; otherwise called; also known as ; formerly known as .
Used to connect the different names of a person who has gone by two or more, and whose true name is for any cause doubtful

main_definition: Otherwise ; at another time; in other circumstances ; otherwise called; also known as ; formerly known as .
secondary_definitions: ( law ) Used to connect the different names of a person who has gone by two or more, and whose true name is for any cause doubtful
